Class cart

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • cart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class cart
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    JPanel extention class that controls a active cart used as a side bar in the GUI
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • populateItem

        public javax.swing.JPanel populateItem​(javax.swing.JLabel name,
                                       Item drink)
        Generates Order object and sends information to database, then clears cart
        Parameters:
        name - of drink that has been added
        drink - Item object contains information (ingredients, price) about new cart item
        Returns:
        JPanel that will be shown in cart and represents new item
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkValidAppend

        public boolean checkValidAppend​(Item currItem,
                                boolean spinner)
        Determines whether the desired item can be added to cart. Updates localInventory appropriately if so, Displays error JFrame if item cannot be added
        Parameters:
        currItem - Item object to be checked (specifically the ingredients member of the object)
        spinner - boolean whether this function is being from a JSpinner event
        Returns:
        boolean whether there are sufficient ingredients to accomodate the item
